author: Christina Farr
title: Private Medicare plan Devoted Health says it is the first to cover Apple Watch as a benefit
description: Devoted Health says it is the first Medicare Advantage plan to offer Apple Watch as a fitness benefit, allowing members to put $150 towards the cost of the device.
content:
Like earlier models, I still love to try to close my rings. This always-on face shows them all day.
Devoted Health, a start-up health insurer targeting seniors with its private Medicare plans, says it is the first to offer Apple Watch as a fitness benefit to… [+5738 chars]
